name: SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - Technical Specification 11.7
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - 1 test per source submitted 2 weeks prior to MSE Construction
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - GAP65 shall meet the grading from Table 14.27, a crushing resistance greater than or equal to 120kN and have a weathering resistance of AA,AB,AC,BA,BB or CA
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - Technical Specification 11.7
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - 1 test per source submitted 2 weeks prior to MSE Construction
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - GAP65 shall meet the grading from Table 14.27, a crushing resistance greater than or equal to 120kN and have a weathering resistance of AA,AB,AC,BA,BB or CA
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - 1 test per source submitted 2 weeks prior to MSE Construction
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - TNZ40 shall comply with NZTA M/4 items 3.3 and 4.2
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - Technical Specification 12.4
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - 1 test per source submitted 2 weeks prior to MSE Construction
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Aggregate must comply with NZTA F/2 with the exception that 5% of material by weight may pass the 75 um test seive.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - Technical Specification 11.4
TEST REQUIRED - Manufacturers certificates, Delivery Dockets
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placement of geogrid
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Geogrid shall be Specification as shown on Drawing RDC03
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - Technical Specification 13.4
TEST REQUIRED - Manufacturers certificates, Delivery Dockets
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placement of subsoil
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Subsoil drains shall be NZTA F/2 compliant. No filter sock is to be used.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to Excavation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Temporary works design shall be completed prior to excavation for the retaining of the cut face.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - DWG - SPEC-01 - Subgrade
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Subgrade is to be cut ti stiff/medium dense natural materials.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - NZTA F2
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to Backfill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Subsoil shall be placed at the line, grade and level shown on the drawings. F2 drainage material shall be installed as shown on the drawings.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - DWG - SPEC-01 & NZTA B/02
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - 1 Set per 0.2m lift

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Hardfill shall be placed and compacted in layers no greater than 200mm. Hardfill shall be tested at a rate of 1 set per 0.3m lift and 15m linear and shall meet a 95% of the MDD average with no tests less than 92% of the MDD
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - DWG RDC03
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to Backfill

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Geogrid shall be placed in a continuous strip with no joints in the strength direction, all other joints require a bodkin connection. Geogrid shall be tensioned as backfilling occurs
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Wainui Road RP4666&4995 - Technical Specification TNZ M/4
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - 1 Set per lift, Pre Seal Engineer Inspection
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - 95% of the MDD average with no tests less than 92% of the MDD
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Following completion of construction
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As built drawings, redline markups and RAMM sheets
